name: Rolling Racers
description:
Welcome to Rolling Racers!

Race with the rolling of the dice, is it skill or luck? We think it's both!

Race through 3 short levels or different sceneries and create your own luck by rolling strategically.

Made in 48 hours for GMTK Jam 2022 by:

Jeffery Xue: Coding, System & Game Design

Steven Yang (stevo): Art, Level Design & Game Design

Billy Liu: AI design, special effects coding

Music by Loyalty Freak Music:

https://loyaltyfreakmusic.com/music/incredible-kart-game/
